title: Seeing if the First Term is Positive or Negative
text: The first term, which is 1, is a positive number.

title: Seeing if the Second Term is Positive or Negative
text: The second term, which is 4, is a positive number.

title: Adding Two Positive Numbers
text: One positive plus four positives is five positives. To visualize this, see the image attached to this hint.\n##figure1.gif##
